summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Jackson Street from 6th Avenue South to 14th Avenue South; Maynard Avenue, 7th Avenue South, 8th Avenue South, 9th Avenue South, 10th Avenue South and 12th Avenue South, each from Jackson Street to King Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2655 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
